hero.title: Elevate your style with
hero.subtitle: AI Intelligence
hero.description: John Styles is your personal fashion assistant. Get personalized outfit recommendations, organize your wardrobe, and visualize new looks instantly.

features.title: Everything you need to look your best
features.subtitle: John Styles combines advanced AI with fashion expertise to help you build a wardrobe you love.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Style Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Get personalized fashion advice based on your unique preferences and body type.

virtualWardrobe.title: Virtual Wardrobe
virtualWardrobe.description: Digitize your closet and organize your outfits effortlessly.

virtualTryOn.title: Virtual Try-On
virtualTryOn.description: Visualize how new clothes will look on you before you buy.

dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your style today.

chat.title: Chat with John Styles
chat.placeholder: Ask John Styles about your outfit...
chat.greeting: Hello! I'm John Styles, your personal fashion assistant. How can I help you look your best today?
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

wardrobe.title: My Wardrobe
wardrobe.noItemsDescription: Get started by adding a new item to your wardrobe.

tryOn.title: Virtual Try-On
tryOn.uploadPhotoDescription: Full body or upper body shot recommended
tryOn.noItemsWardrobe: No items in wardrobe. Add items first.
tryOn.generatingDescription: This may take a few moments.
tryOn.placeholder: Upload a photo and select an item to see the magic happen.
tryOn.customPromptHelp: Describe how you want the clothing item to appear on the person in the photo

errors.quotaExceeded: API quota limit reached. Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before trying again. Consider upgrading to a paid plan if you need more capacity.
errors.retryIn: You can retry in approximately {{seconds}} seconds.
errors.genericError: Failed to generate image. Please try again.
errors.noImage: No image was generated. Please try again.

onboarding.title: Welcome to John Styles
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get to know your style. Describe your fashion preferences, favorite colors, occasions you dress for, brands you love, and things you dislike.
onboarding.placeholder: E.g., I love casual wear, mostly jeans and t-shirts. My favorite colors are blue and black. I dress for work which is business casual. I dislike bright colors and tight fitting clothes.
onboarding.error: Failed to analyze profile. Please try again.
